meanings.sent1: I searched the whole house, but found bupkis.
meanings.sent2: He promised to help, but ended up giving me bupkis.
meanings.sent3: When I asked for a raise, my boss offered me bupkis instead.
meanings.sent4: The empty box contained bupkis but dust.
meanings.sent5: The treasure hunt led to bupkis, just an empty chest.

meanings.sent1: The broken toy was bupkis to me.
meanings.sent2: She realized the fake jewelry was bupkis.
meanings.sent3: Trying to fix the old computer was bupkis, it never worked.
meanings.sent4: His empty promises were bupkis, never fulfilled.
meanings.sent5: The rusty key turned out to be bupkis, couldn't open anything.

meanings.sent1: The story he told was bupkis, made no sense.
meanings.sent2: She dismissed his excuses as bupkis.
meanings.sent3: The cat wearing a hat was bupkis, cats don't wear hats!
meanings.sent4: His explanation for being late was bupkis, pure fiction.
meanings.sent5: The conspiracy theory was bupkis, just wild ideas.
